title: [K-12] Computer-Based Mathematics Education for Elderly Learners: Cognitive Load Minimization Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Arithmetic Operations (Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication, Division)
context.additional_context: Since learners may be unfamiliar with digital devices, step-by-step guidance is necessary.

learning_goals: Learners can explain basic concepts of fractions, decimals, and ratios with 80% accuracy.
Learners can solve over 70% of real-life problems using visual tools provided in the LMS.
Learners can independently solve over three math problems by applying multimedia learning strategies that reduce cognitive load.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
